body:
## Program Goals, Objectives and Performance Indicators View a webinar describing Goals, Objectives, and Performance Indicators to assist in the process of grant and program development.
[![IMAGE ALT TEXT HERE](https://img.youtube.com/vi/C6-qCnIsNjs/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C6-qCnIsNjs) ##### Click to play on YouTube{.muted .pull-10}
## Logic Models View this Logic Model webinar series to assist in the process of program planning and development.
### The Value of Logic Models (Part 1){.mt-5} [![IMAGE ALT TEXT HERE](https://img.youtube.com/vi/rop6xoEA_NQ/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rop6xoEA_NQ) ##### Click to play on YouTube{.muted .pull-10} ### The Value of Logic Models (Part 2){.mt-5} [![IMAGE ALT TEXT HERE](https://img.youtube.com/vi/1bGkwPgwmcw/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1bGkwPgwmcw) ##### Click to play on YouTube{.muted .pull-10} ### The Value of Logic Models (Part 3){.mt-5} [![IMAGE ALT TEXT HERE](https://img.youtube.com/vi/6O5YP5d2iTs/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6O5YP5d2iTs) ##### Click to play on YouTube{.muted .pull-10}
## Amendments to Grant Agreements View a webinar on the process of amending an existing Authority grant agreement.
[![IMAGE ALT TEXT HERE](https://img.youtube.com/vi/iHsWphZtbzU/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iHsWphZtbzU) ##### Click to play on YouTube{.muted .pull-10}
## Budget Categories Needing Prior Approval View a webinar describing items that require Prior Approvals and/or Additional Justifications (even if they are detailed in the agreement narrative and budget).
[![IMAGE ALT TEXT HERE](https://img.youtube.com/vi/YjkFmPid5DI/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YjkFmPid5DI) ##### Click to play on YouTube{.muted .pull-10}
## Budget Category: Travel Costs View a webinar describing Travel Costs and State Travel Guidelines.
[![IMAGE ALT TEXT HERE](https://img.youtube.com/vi/nQb8pK5e3Mo/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nQb8pK5e3Mo) ##### Click to play on YouTube{.muted .pull-10}
## Budget Category: Subcontractors This webinar describes the Subcontract Approval process and required Consultant/Contractor/Vendor documentation.
[![IMAGE ALT TEXT HERE](https://img.youtube.com/vi/zXIopZ4KeEI/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zXIopZ4KeEI) ##### Click to play on YouTube{.muted .pull-10}
## Budget Category: Indirect Costs View a webinar on Indirect Costs.
[![IMAGE ALT TEXT HERE](https://img.youtube.com/vi/4stkASoNY5w/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4stkASoNY5w) ##### Click to play on YouTube{.muted .pull-10}
## Faith-Based Program Self Reporting Form View a webinar on how to complete the Authority's Faith-Based Program Self Reporting Form.
[![IMAGE ALT TEXT HERE](https://img.youtube.com/vi/x6cqf0075Fg/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x6cqf0075Fg) ##### Click to play on YouTube{.muted .pull-10}
frontmatter:
title: 'Webinars'
posted: '2019-01-15'
excerpt: 'The Grant Accountability and Transparency Act (GATA) of 2014, 30 ILCS 708/1 et seq., increased accountability and transparency in the use of grant funds and reduced the administrative burden on state agencies and grantees through adoption of federal grant guidelines and regulations.'
menuItem: true
position: 3
section: 'pages'
title: Webinars
excerpt: The Grant Accountability and Transparency Act (GATA) of 2014, 30 ILCS 708/1 et seq., increased accountability and transparency in the use of grant funds and reduced the administrative burden on state agencies and grantees through adoption of federal grant guidelines and regulations.
